title: Avast Internet Security 2016 12.1.2272 (Build 12.1.3076.6)
description:
Avast Internet Security 2016 12.1.2272 (Build 12.1.3076.6) + Keys [4realtorrentz]

Avast Internet Security is a robust security suite that houses numerous tools to protect your system. The suite includes a firewall, antivirus, anti-phishing tool, vpn secure line, and smart scan tools. With Avast Internet Security you can adjust the parameters of scan modes; pick target areas to scan, enable the scan mode for all file types. Or you can customize the scan to recognize file types by content/name extension/user-defined file extension.

Key features include:

- Firewall.
- Real time threat detection.
- Anti-phishing tool.
- Sandbox.
- Antivirus.
- VPN Secure Line.
- Anti-spam tool.
- Smart Scan.
- Robust protection.

Avast Internet Security also includes some new technologies such as secure dns, scan https, and home security network to add to your protection.

What's New Avast Internet Security 2016 12.1.2272:

- Lower system impact â€“ faster boot time, less space taken on disk.
- CyberCapture â€“ better detection of unknown and unique files via our cloud technology.
- Regular monthly program updates â€“ automatic and silent, configurable via Settings.
- Improved detection of router vulnerabilities.
- New Bank mode in SafeZone browser.
- Faster SecureLine connection.
- Antispam is now as opt-in component.
- Removed hardware virtualization (NG) â€“ replaced with CyberCapture,that has much lower impact on system resources.
- Removed Remote assistance â€“ not used enough and not a core functionality.

Requirements: Windows (All Versions) 
Languages: Multiple languages

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Use a given license file to register
3. Double Click On The Key File (Note that not all lic files will work correctly)
4. Click Yes->Ok
5. Done
